1.  Focus the beam through the objective (pink) using the f200 lens: slide the lens along the rails to adjust the distance between the lens and objective until the beam path passes through the infinity corrected objective.

:::

2.  Place the xyz-stage (orange) on top of the objective. If necessary, use support cubes to reinforce the structure.
:::
:::::

::::: {.grid style="--bs-rows: 1; --bs-columns: 3;"}

:::
